episodes.title: Exploring The Weirdest Cult You've Never Heard Of
episodes.description:
Today I explored one of the strangest pieces of Florida history - the Koreshan Unity Settlement, now preserved as Koreshan State Park. This wasn't just your average utopian commune... these folks believed we live inside the Earth. Yep, hollow Earth theory, celibacy, and a self-proclaimed messiah named Cyrus Teed - it's wild.

Join me as I walk through the preserved buildings, talk about the group's beliefs, and dig into how this cult-like group ended up right here in Estero, Florida. The vibes are equal parts peaceful and eerie, and the history is fascinating.

🌴 Subscribe for more offbeat Florida adventures, weird history, and budget-friendly travel ideas!

🔥 Don't forget to LIKE, COMMENT, and SUBSCRIBE for more epic travel content! 🔥
